title: Textile, 19th–20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim
description: Small rectangle of cotton with two large repeats of design enclosing squares, dots, and triangles. Reserved white, rust, and blue on dark brown ground.
